show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #7, Dallas Mount "All that matters is what we do next"
subtitle: #7, Dallas Mount "All that matters is what we do next"
summary:
Dallas Mount CEO of Ranch Management Consultants joins us to share lessons he's learned in 20 years in extension service, teaching the High Plains Ranch Practicum and now the Ranching For Profit School.

We talk about how the management tools have improved and debate pugging.

We discuss how forage is the engine that drives the profit on the Ranch and how we are all in the business of turning sunlight into protein.

https://ranchmanagement.com/
